dark-default.name: Set Dark Mode as Default
dark-default.description: If enabled, dark mode will default to true for users that haven\'t set a preference.

dark-prefers-color-scheme.name: Set Dark Mode according to prefers color scheme
dark-prefers-color-scheme.description: UiPress will detetct the OS color scheme and update accordingly

dark-disabled.name: Disable dark mode
dark-disabled.description: If enabled, dark mode switch will not be available.

redirect-overview.name: Set overview page as homepage
redirect-overview.description: If enabled, the overview page will be the homepage when logging in and when accessing the admin area.

redirect-custom.name: Set custom page as homepage
redirect-custom.description: If enabled, the page you choose will be the homepage when logging in and when accessing the admin area. For admin pages use a relative URL (path after /wp-admin/), for other pages use an absolute URL

rename-plugin.name: Rename UiPress
rename-plugin.description: White label UiPress by changing the name displayed.

rename-plugin-author.name: Rename UiPress plugin author
rename-plugin-author.description: White label UiPress by changing the author in the plugin table.

rename-plugin-link.name: Change UiPress plugin URL
rename-plugin-link.description: White label UiPress by changing the plugin URL in the plugin table.

app-icon.name: App Icon
app-icon.description: Replace UiPress plugin icon with your own

admin-favicon.name: Admin Favicon
admin-favicon.description: Add an image to be used as the site favicon for admin pages.

hide-plugin.name: Hide UiPress from plugin table
hide-plugin.description: If enabled, UiPress will be hidden from the plugin table

hide-footer.name: Hide Footer
hide-footer.description: Hide the footer text that shows at the bottom of every admin page

footer-text.name: Footer Text
footer-text.description: Text entered here will be present at the bottom of admin pages

disabled-for.name: Menu Disabled for
disabled-for.description: UiPress menu will be disabled for any users or roles you select

light-logo.name: Logo Light Mode
light-logo.description: Sets the logo for the admin bar in light mode.

dark-logo.name: Logo Dark Mode
dark-logo.description: Optional dark mode logo for admin bar.

load-front.name: Load UiPress Menu on front end
load-front.description: If enabled, UiPress menu will load on the front end. Please note, this will not work on all themes and styling will vary

load-front-for.name: Only Load UiPress Menu on front end for
load-front-for.description: Only load front end menu for selected roles and usernames

light-logo-collapsed.name: Collapsed Menu Logo Light Mode
light-logo-collapsed.description: Optional logo for when the menu is collapsed.

dark-logo-collapsed.name: Collapsed Menu Logo Dark Mode
dark-logo-collapsed.description: Optional dark nmode logo for when the menu is collapsed.

show-site-logo.name: Show site title in menu
show-site-logo.description: If enabled, the site title will be displayed in the menu next to the logo

shrunk-default.name: Set collapsed menu as default
shrunk-default.description: If enabled, the menu will default to the shrunk menu for users that haven\'t set a preference..

status.name: Disable ToolBar Module?
status.description: Creates new admin bar, adds user off canvas menu, builds global search and notification center.

disabled-for.name: Admin Bar Disabled For
disabled-for.description: UiPress toolbar module will be disabled for any users or roles you select

legacy-admin.name: Hide admin bar links (left side)
legacy-admin.description: Disables legacy links on left side of admin bar for all users. Also hides the user preference.

flyout-toolbar.name: Enable floating flyout toolbar
flyout-toolbar.description: Changes the toolbar to a floating flyout toolbar

search-disabled.name: Disable Search
search-disabled.description: Disables search icon and global search function from admin bar.

new-enabled.name: Disable Create Button
new-enabled.description: Disables the \'create\' button in the admin bar.

view-new-tab.name: Open View Website in new tab
view-new-tab.description: When enabled, clicking on view website or the home button will open in a new browser tab

view-enabled.name: Disable View Website Button
view-enabled.description: Disables the view website link button in the admin bar.

load-front.name: Load UiPress admin bar on front end
load-front.description: If enabled, UiPress toolbar will load on the front end. Please note, this will not work on all themes and styling will vary

hide-admin.name: Hide admin bar on front end
hide-admin.description: If enabled, front end admin bar will not load.

notification-center-disabled.name: Disable Notification Center
notification-center-disabled.description: If disabled, notifcations will show in the normal way

post-types-search.name: Post Types available in Search
post-types-search.description: The global search will only search the selected post types.

post-types-create.name: Post Types available in create button (new)
post-types-create.description: Only the selected post types will show up in the create dropdown.

notifcations-disabled-for.name: Only show notifications to
notifcations-disabled-for.description: UiPress will hide all notifications from all users except those selected below

updates-disabled-for.name: Only show updates to
updates-disabled-for.description: UiPress will hide all updates from all users except those selected below

status.name: Disable Admin Theme Module
status.description: When the theme is disabled, pages will be styles in the original way.

disabled-for.name: Theme Disabled for
disabled-for.description: When the theme is disabled, pages will be styles in the original way for selected users or roles.

status.name: Disable Login Module
status.description: When the login module is disabled, the login page will be displayed in the original way.

login-dark-mode.name: Dark Mode
login-dark-mode.description: Puts the login page in dark mode for all users.

remove-language-selector.name: Disable Language Selector
remove-language-selector.description: Removes the language selector added to the login page

login-logo.name: Login Logo
login-logo.description: Sets the logo for the login page

login-background.name: Login Background
login-background.description: Sets an optional background image on the login page.

disabled-for.name: Advanced Disabled For
disabled-for.description: Code added here will not load for any users or roles you select

enqueue-scripts.name: Enqueue scripts
enqueue-scripts.description: Add scripts to the head of every admin page and login page

enqueue-styles.name: Enqueue styles
enqueue-styles.description: Add stylesheets to the head of every admin page and login page

admin-css.name: Admin CSS
admin-css.description: CSS added here will be loaded on every admin page as well as the login page

admin-js.name: Admin JavaScript
admin-js.description: JavaScript added here will be loaded on every admin page as well as the login page

admin-html.name: HTML for document head
admin-html.description: Add HTML here to be added to every admin page and login page head section

status.name: Disable Folders?
status.description: No media folders will be displayed when this option is activated.

disabled-for.name: Folders Disabled For
disabled-for.description: UiPress folders will be disabled for any users or roles you select

folders-post-tyes.name: Enable folders for post types
folders-post-tyes.description: UiPress folders will be enabled post, page and custom post types you choose

status.name: Disable Menu Creator?
status.description: If disabled, the menu creator will not be available to any users.

status.name: Disable Overview Page?
status.description: Overview page will be hidden when this option is activated.

disabled-for.name: Overview Page Disabled For
disabled-for.description: Overview Page will be disabled for any users or roles you select

disable-edit-for.name: Who can edit the overview page?
disable-edit-for.description: Any role or user chosen here will be able to edit the overview page. If none are chosen it will fall back to administrators only

start-day.name: Default report start date
start-day.description: By default the overview date range will start 7 days before current date. Add a number of days between 1 and 90 to change length of date range

end-day.name: Default report end date offset
end-day.description: By default the overview date range will end on the current day (0). To end the report on yesterday for example, enter 1

reporting-currency.name: Reporting Currency Symbol
reporting-currency.description: If you are using google analytics commerce reports, enter the currency symbol your reports are in here

custom-welcome.name: Custom welcome message
custom-welcome.description: Add a custom welcome message here to displayed on the overview page

status.name: Disable Content Page?
status.description: If disabled, the content page will not be available to any users.

disabled-for.name: Content Page Disabled for
disabled-for.description: When the content page module is disabled, the content page will not be accesible for the users / roles

post-types-content.name: Post types available in content page
post-types-content.description: Only the selected post types will be available in the content page.

private-mode.name: Enable private library mode
private-mode.description: When enabled, the content page will only show content created by or uploaded by the currently logged in user. This also includes folders

status.name: Disable custom admin pages?
status.description: If disabled, the admin pages will not be available to any users.

admin-slug.name: Admin Page Slug
admin-slug.description: This defaults to admin-pages. Changes to this will need you to resave permalink structure.

disabled-for.name: Who can edit and create admin pages?
disabled-for.description: Editing and creation of admin pages will be disabled for the users or roles you select

show-pages-for.name: Who can see admin pages?
show-pages-for.description: UiPress will only show admin pages for the users or roles you select

status.name: Disable Users Page?
status.description: If disabled, the user management page will not be available to any users.

disabled-for.name: User management page Disabled for
disabled-for.description: When the user management page module is disabled, the user management page will not be accesible for the users / roles

history-enabled.name: Enable user activity log?
history-enabled.description: If enabled, uipress will log actions taken by all users, including page views, comments, post creation etc.

history-page-views-disabled.name: Disable page view logging
history-page-views-disabled.description: By Default, uipress will track page views for logged in users as part of the activity log. While sometimes useful, this will have the biggest impact on the log size in the database. Disabling this feature will keep the log smaller.

recent-page-views-enabled.name: Enable recent page view logging
recent-page-views-enabled.description: Seperate to the main history log, uipress will keep 5 recent page views in the user meta. This can have a small impact on the page load speed.

history-expiry.name: How long to keep history?
history-expiry.description: By default, activity items will be deleted after 60 days, enter the amount of days to keep items to change this

delay-history.name: Delay history entries?
delay-history.description: Use scheduled tasks to insert the history actions to avoid any extra page load speed. By default entries are added as they happen, with this enabled there will be delay of about 10 seconds before actions appear.

anonymize-ip.name: Anonymize user IP addresses?
anonymize-ip.description: Each history item logs the users IP address, enable this to anonymize the address.
